tool_description: ADSBexchange.com traffic feed for flight simulators
name: ADSBx Flight Sim Traffic
title: ADSBx Flight Sim Traffic

api_list.name: LiveTraffic
api_list.description: Returns all aircraft within 25nm radius of specified Lat/Lon

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude (-180 to 180) Hint: US is negative longitude!

utterances.utterance: Show me all aircraft within 25 nautical miles of New York City.
What planes are flying near Los Angeles right now?
Get the live air traffic around Miami.
Can you provide the aircraft data near Chicago?
I need to see the planes flying around San Francisco.
What's the current air traffic near Dallas?
Show me the aircraft within 25 miles of Seattle.
Find the live traffic of planes around Denver.
What is the air traffic like near Boston?
Get me the aircraft data for the area around Las Vegas.
